reviewText: My dad was looking for this movie, The Great Escape II: The Untold Story. I found this on this website and it is a good movie.
Title: Great Escape II:The Untold Story VHS

reviewText: The VHS recorded tape of this made-for-tv movie was a travesty.  The original film was shown in 2 nights. The running time of the original was 178 mins.  Vidmark's VHS version is 93 mins. You do the math.  What is left is a film that makes absolutely no sense to a first time viewer. Some of the scenes are spliced together with no thought to continuity, jumping from one scene to another.  Viewers are bound to wonder "what did I miss". I would highly recommend giving this VHS version a definite "miss".  If I could rate it lower than 1 star I most would do so.
summary: Great Escape II: The Untold Story, The
Title: Great Escape II:The Untold Story VHS

reviewText: I enjoed this movie a lot.  It's hard to beat the 1963 Great Escape but this one is good.  I thought this movie was very accurate.  I recommend it for Great Escape fans!
Title: Great Escape II:The Untold Story VHS

reviewText: The VCR that I have was made to run on a low speed, and was apparently cut to make it fit a time schedule for media showing.  Still the story and the acting are excellent.  It is an excellent followup to the original "Great Escape" and well worth watching.  If it were possible to find all the missing parts and put it in a DVD format, it could be truly outstanding.
Title: Great Escape II:The Untold Story VHS

reviewText: It was an interesting way to have a follow up with the escaped prisoners.  How much of this was actual fact and how much was hollywood hype is up in the air.  It was an entertaining movie overall.
Title: Great Escape II:The Untold Story VHS
